#summary Humo syntaxis

= Language operations =

There are only two operations in Humo language:
 #Production definition
 #Production usage

 *===Production definition===
<code language="js">
p1{v1}
</code>
Defines a production p1 with value v1

 *===Production usage===
<code language="js">
   p1{v1}
   result{p1}
</code>

When producton p1 is found it's replaced by its value v1.
<code language="js">
   p1{v1}
   result{v1}
</code>
